column4: Does anyone know if it is possible to install the new nvidia driver with envyng? (I mean 173.14.12)
envyng's results are hit and miss use at your own risk
I wouldn't change  / update the nvidia drivers unless I have an exceptional reason
i have been using 173.14.09... there are some bugs but it is much better than the version that comes on hardy
only you can answer that
what does that mean?
depends on your hardware, your card and your bugs
ok... but my question was completely different
I already have envyng . The question is how do I install the newest version
envyng should get the new drivers for you
it only gets the .09 not the .12
wait for the updates then
yes, but it was already announced... so I was wondering if someone knew what was going on
announced where ?
planet ubuntu
have you re-run envyng ?
shared .thumbs dir ?
maybe ... but I didn't do anything
and where is the .thumb dir?
home dir
thanks... let me check that
ok... why dolphin can update thumbnails and nautilus can't
check the permissions ? Nautilus probably can, but it doesn't as the file hasn't changed
